item.title: Get Started with Git and Github in Under 10 Minutes
item.description: Git is probably the most popular version control system being used right now, and if you have any experience with other version control systems like subversion than it’s strongly reccomended that you go through this section since lot of concepts from other systems dont directly translate to Git. Git Basics You can create a local Git repository on your computer by either: Clone an existing Git repository from a remote repository on internet (e.
